    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    CashierMainFrame
    Main frame for the cashier interface in the Sharetea POS system.
    CheckoutDialog
    Checkout dialog for processing customer orders in the Sharetea POS system.
    CustomizationDialog
    Dialog to customize a menu item (sugar, ice, boba, size, quantity).
    DatabaseConnection
    Database connection manager for the Sharetea POS system.
    EmployeeManagementPanel
    Panel for managing employees
    InventoryItem
    Inventory item model representing stock items in the Sharetea POS system.
    InventoryItemDialog
    Dialog for adding/editing inventory items
    InventoryManagementPanel
    Panel for managing inventory items
    InventoryService
    Service class for managing inventory-related database operations in the Sharetea POS system.
    LineChart
    Custom component for drawing line charts
    LoginFrame
    Login frame for Sharetea POS system
    ManagerMainFrame
    Main frame for manager interface
    ManagerMainFrame.RefreshablePanel
    Interface for panels that can be refreshed
    MenuItem
    Menu item model representing drinks and food items in the Sharetea POS system.
    MenuItemDialog
    Dialog for adding/editing menu items
    MenuManagementPanel
    Panel for managing menu items
    MenuService
    Service class for managing menu-related database operations in the Sharetea POS system.
    Order
    Order model representing customer transactions in the Sharetea POS system.
    OrderItem
    Order item model representing individual items in a customer order in the Sharetea POS system.
    OrderService
    Service class for managing order-related database operations in the Sharetea POS system.
    OrderService.SalesSummary
    Data transfer object representing daily sales summary metrics.
    OrderService.TopSellingItem
    Data transfer object representing analytics for a top-selling menu item.
    Payment
    Payment model representing payment transactions in the Sharetea POS system.
    ReportsPanel
    Panel for viewing reports
    SalesVisualizationPanel
    Panel for sales visualization with charts and filtering
    ShareteaPOS
    Main application class for the Sharetea POS System.
    TestDatabaseConnection
    Test class for verifying database connection and basic functionality in the Sharetea POS system.
    User
    User model representing employees in the Sharetea POS system.
    UserDialog
    Dialog for adding/editing users
    UserService
    Service class for managing user-related database operations in the Sharetea POS system.
    VerticalHistogram
    Custom component for drawing vertical histograms
